I thought this was an amazing film. I haven't watched too many Lupin movies, but this is one of the best I've seen. Those getting into the Lupin the 3rd series may enjoy this, but don't take it too seriously.

The movie arrived fast just as specified and it was great. The lupin series has been one of my shows for years and the movies are awesome and funny as hell.

I had the pleasure of seeing this on the big screen at Otakon years back. I was blown away! This has to be my favorite Lupin the Third movie next to Castle of CagliostroLupin the III: The Castle of Cagliostro (Special Edition). It has all the action and suspense you would expect in a Lupin movie. This time around a good portion of the story has to with Goemon. We get to learn a little more of his mysterious past. He and a girl from his clan are after a mysterious dragon statue that apparantly is made out of the same unique metal of Goemon's sword. Lupin and his crew are after the same prize. Lupin and Goemon find themselves on opposing sides! To make matters worse, a Chinese gangster and bunch of ninjas are also after the statue. Everyone wants the dragon statue for different reasons. Its up to Lupin and Goemon to overcome their differences and find out the mystery of the dragon statue. I can't recommend this superb movie enough. It has all of the action,suspese,mystery,and drama you would expect from a Lupin the 3rd movie and more. Check it out!!!
This movie was actually pretty nice.  The person I bought it for watched it immediately after it arrived.  It was in pristine condition and still new in package.

It begans when Goemon is attacked by ninjas trying to claim his Almighty Sword which can cut through any material on Earth. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko discover notorious Hong Kong mobster Chin Chin Chou is searching for a treasure that lies hidden within the Titanic.
